reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth Every Penny
reviews.reviewText: I recently had the pleasure of trying out the Oribe Gold Lust Repair & Restore Conditioner, and I must say, it's truly a game-changer for damaged hair. From its luxurious packaging to its impressive performance, this conditioner has exceeded my expectations in every way.First and foremost, the scent of this conditioner is absolutely divine. It has a delicate yet captivating fragrance that lingers in your hair long after you've rinsed it out. Every time I catch a whiff of my hair throughout the day, I'm reminded of the indulgent experience this product provides.In terms of performance, the Gold Lust Repair & Restore Conditioner is simply outstanding. I have chemically treated hair that tends to be dry and brittle, but this conditioner has worked wonders in revitalizing and restoring my locks. The formula is rich and creamy, instantly melting into my hair, and I can feel it nourishing every strand as I massage it in.What sets this conditioner apart is its ability to repair and strengthen damaged hair. After just a few uses, I noticed a significant improvement in the overall health and appearance of my hair. It feels softer, smoother, and has a beautiful shine that catches the light.Another noteworthy aspect of this conditioner is its lightweight formula. Despite its intense moisturizing properties, it doesn't weigh down my hair or leave any residue behind. Instead, it leaves my hair feeling bouncy, manageable, and full of life.Although the Oribe Gold Lust Repair & Restore Conditioner is on the higher end in terms of price, I believe it's worth every penny. You only need a small amount per use, as a little goes a long way. Plus, the results are truly remarkable, making it a worthwhile investment for anyone looking to revive their damaged hair.In conclusion, the Oribe Gold Lust Repair & Restore Conditioner is a luxurious and effective product that delivers on its promises. It not only smells heavenly but also works wonders in repairing and restoring damaged hair, leaving it looking and feeling healthier than ever. If you're willing to invest in a top-notch conditioner, I highly recommend giving this one a try. Your hair will thank you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Leaves hair soft
reviews.reviewText: The conditioner leaves your hair soft and shiny. It’s pricey but leaves hair that’s manageable, soft, shiny and not greasy looking.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Smells great! Leaves no tangles behind! Tried many many conditioners on my easily tangled hair and this is by far THE BEST! It smells great too! GET IT!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars FINALLY!!! A conditioner that doesn't wear my hair down!
reviews.reviewText: I've spent a good portion of my life looking for a conditioner that will not weigh down my baby fine, color treated hair.This conditioner is expensive, but holy crap, does it ever work.It feels 'clean' but moisturizing when applied. It's easy to work through my tangled strands, and it rinses out so clean, leaving no residue behind.The smell is absolutely fantastic. I hate overpowering scents, but this smells clean, not exceptionally floral, I'd say...sort of woodsy?Give it a shot.I'm going to buy extra since every product I find and love is soon discontinued.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Is it worth the high price? I decided to splurge on myself and I’m a changed woman. This stuff is legit. People have said “your hair looks healthier” “did you get a haircut?” “your hair is so soft” “wow you smell good” all thanks to this shampoo and conditioner. I have fine, frizzy, bleached at home hair that I’m trying to grow out. This makes my hair soft and shiny. It also is the best product I’ve tried at making my oily scalp feel clean. It doesn’t do much for my frizz issue (a light hair oil solves that though). Shipped fast and in good condition. The shampoo and conditioner come in their own packaging, a thin cardboard box, and that is mailed in the classic Amazon envelope. I didn’t have issues with leakage like some other reviewers, but these do not come with a seal so that is always a possibility. If you have a little extra money and want to pamper yourself, I recommend trying it… but you might get hooked and seriously consider spending big $$$ on shampoo and conditioner here on out!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Thanks from my hair!
reviews.reviewText: The best calming product I’ve ever used on my very curly hair. No more frizz and I can actually dryit straight and smooth.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Barely any product, terrible smell, incredible conditioner
reviews.reviewText: I’m very torn because for this amount of money, to get such a small amount (not even 8oz) is obscene. It also has a terrible perfume smell that if you’re sensitive to smell is very hard to tolerate. But it’s a really good conditioner aside from that. Incredibly moisturizing. It would be perfect if it was just a big bigger and stank less

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Only need to use a little. Works great on my damaged bleached hair.

reviews.reviewTitle: J’adore il fait de beau cheveux

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 26, 2020
reviews.reviewText: I love the product but, given that it is an expensive product that people might buy as a gift for others, I thought it worth noting that the packaging arrived quite damaged.
どうやっても、髪が落ちつかなかった私の髪が、まとまって生まれて初めての質感になりました。
